messages.content:
Write me a cover letter for this company. 
Info:
Senior at the unversity of cincinnati
experienced in C#, Java, Kotlin, JS/TS/NodeJS, HTML5, XML, SQL, XAML, Python, RegEx, Firefox/Chrome Extensions, ASP.NET.




My GPA is 3.4,
The company is: CetriK,
I want the body to be 3 Paragraphs long,
I want the cover letter formatted exactly like this:
Dear Hiring Manager,
Body
Sincerely,
[Your Name]

Role Description:
 About the job
We are seeking talented interns to experience, contribute and grow at a fast-moving Blockchain Startup in NYC!

About The Company

One of the fastest-growing and most trusted companies in blockchain security, CertiK is a true market leader. To date, CertiK has worked with over 3,200 Enterprise clients, secured over $310 billion worth of digital assets, and has detected over 60,000 vulnerabilities in blockchain code. Our clients include leading projects such as Aave, Polygon, Binance Smart Chain, Terra, Yearn, and Chiliz.

Investors = Insight Partners, Sequoia, Tiger Global, Coatue Management, Lightspeed, Advent International, SoftBank, Hillhouse Capital, Goldman Sachs, Coinbase Ventures, Binance, Shunwei Capital, IDG Capital, Wing, Legend Star, Danhua Capital and other investors.

You are

    Thriving in a fast-paced, dynamic working environment.
    Self-driven and passionate about cutting-edge technologies. Problem solver and fast learner with good analysis skills.
    A strong team-player and always willing to make a positive impact on the team. Good verbal and written communication skills.

Requirements

    A BS/MS/PhD degree in Computer Science or relevant field or equivalent professional experience. Mastery of one or more backend languages: Python, Javascript(NodeJS), Golang, Ruby, Scala, Java, C/C++, etc.
    Solid computer science fundamentals in object-oriented design, data structure and algorithms, computer networks, database systems, distributed systems, etc.
    Excellent written communication/presentation skills, able to conduct client-facing meetings, output technical blogs addressing general/security topics, great team collaborations.
    CI/CD, Docker, Git, Shell, Databases, Messaging Systems, Data Processing (Spark).

Compensation: depending on level of experience: $2000 - $6000/month (fulltime)

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the internship position at CertiK. As a senior at the University of Cincinnati, I have gained valuable knowledge and experience in various programming languages, including C#, Java, Kotlin, JavaScript, TypeScript, NodeJS, HTML5, XML, SQL, XAML, Python, RegEx, and creating Firefox/Chrome Extensions. Additionally, I am well-versed in ASP.NET and have a solid understanding of blockchain technology.

I am thrilled at the opportunity to contribute to a fast-moving Blockchain Startup like CertiK. I have a proven track record of thriving in fast-paced, dynamic working environments, and I am passionate about staying at the forefront of cutting-edge technologies. My problem-solving skills, combined with my ability to quickly learn and adapt, make me an ideal candidate for this position. I am a team player who is always willing to make a positive impact and I possess strong verbal and written communication skills.

I hold a GPA of 3.4 and I have a BS degree in Computer Science. My coursework has provided me with a solid foundation in object-oriented design, data structures and algorithms, computer networks, database systems, and distributed systems. I am also experienced in CI/CD, Docker, Git, Shell, Databases, Messaging Systems, and Data Processing with Spark. I have excellent written communication and presentation skills, and I am confident in my ability to conduct client-facing meetings and produce technical blogs addressing general and security topics.

I am extremely excited about the opportunity to join CertiK and contribute to the company's growth. I believe that my skills, experience, and passion for blockchain technology make me a strong fit for this role. Additionally, I am confident that my ability to quickly learn and adapt will allow me to excel in a rapidly evolving industry.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of discussing my qualifications further and learning more about how I can contribute to the success of CertiK.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
